import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Calendar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calendar=()=>{const[prayerTimes,setPrayerTimes]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const fetchPrayerTimes=async(city,country)=>{const promises=[];for(let i=0;i<30;i++){const date=new Date();date.setDate(date.getDate()+i);const formattedDate=date.toISOString().split('T')[0];promises.push(axios.get("http://api.aladhan.com/v1/timingsByCity?city=".concat(city,"&country=").concat(country,"&method=2&date=").concat(formattedDate)));}try{const responses=await Promise.all(promises);const times=responses.map(response=>response.data.data.timings);setPrayerTimes(times);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError('Error fetching prayer times');setLoading(false);console.error('Prayer Times Error:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchPrayerTimes('Istanbul','Turkey');// Replace with the desired city and country
},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calendar-page",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"calendar",children:prayerTimes.length>0?prayerTimes.map((times,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calendar-day",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Day ",index+1]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Fajr: ",times.Fajr]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Dhuhr: ",times.Dhuhr]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Asr: ",times.Asr]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Maghrib: ",times.Maghrib]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Isha: ",times.Isha]})]},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No prayer times available"})})]});};export default Calendar;
